attributes.action: make it illegal to dock the tails of all animals, except in case of injury that requires such amputation, and never for any purpose of increasing profits on the animal concerned
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is no need to amputate the tails or any other bony structure of any animal, unless the animal has been injured or diseased. 
Amputation should be performed only for an individual animals's welfare, and not for increasing profits for the animal's owner.
